nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Vader Chronicles was a LEGO Star Wars canceled book about Darth Vader from Scholastic Inc. The author is Ace Landers, and it was planned to be published on January 6, 2015. The title featured an appearance by a previously unseen Jedi.
"Perfect for fans of any age, this humorous story is based on the newest LEGO(R) Star Wars(TM) TV/DVD special!
Darth Vader is the ultimate Jedi bad guy! This humorous and action-packed book features all of your favorite heroes and villains as well as a never-before-seen Jedi!"
